info.title: OPERA Cloud Price Availability Rate API
info.description:
APIs to cater for Price and Rate Availability functionality in OPERA Cloud.

Availability enables you to manage your room inventory by providing a detailed view of all available and sold rooms at a property. Some of the tasks you can perform include defining conditions for stay restrictions, setting room sell limits, and searching for and viewing room availability.

Compatible with OPERA Cloud release 24.4.

This document and all content within is available under the Universal Permissive License v 1.0 (https://oss.oracle.com/licenses/upl). Copyright (c) 2020, 2024 Oracle and/or its affiliates.

get.description:
This API fetches hotel availablity for multiple hotels, given dates, RatePlans, Rate Category, Rate Group, Membership Rates, Number of People.

OperationId:getHotelAvailabilityCRO

This API allows a time span of 90 days.

parameters.name: cro
parameters.description: Central reservation office Code who is requesting Rate Availability.

parameters.name: hotelIds
parameters.description: Hotel code of the Hotel whose Rate Availability is requested.

parameters.name: includeClosedRates
parameters.description: Used to indicate if closed rates are to be included in the Rate Plan set.

parameters.name: includeDefaultRatePlanSet
parameters.description: Used to indicate if the configured default rate plan set will be included.

parameters.name: includeNoRatePlanSet
parameters.description: Includes the rate codes which do not have a rate plan set associated. This parameter is applicable when the property has not configured a default rate plan set.

parameters.name: initialRatePlanSet
parameters.description: If InitialRatePlanSet is set to true response will return most relevant Rate Plan Set(e.g. NEGOTIATED if profiles has Negotiated Rates) depending on the request. if request does not requires special Rate Plan Set, it will return default Rate Plan Set if RatePlanSet value is not set.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return.

parameters.name: pagePointerKey
parameters.description: Specifies fetched record's key as pointer to fetch additional records from. If key is composite use comma separated string.

parameters.name: ratePlanSet
parameters.description: Rate Plan Set code to filter Rate Plans based on the predefined set. if not specified it will not filter any Rate Plans by Rate Plan Set. When InitialRatePlanSet is true response may not always return Rate Plans for the supplied Rate Plan Set(See InitialRatePlanSet documentation).

parameters.name: redeemAwards
parameters.description: Used to indicate if the awards are to be redeemed.

parameters.name: adults
parameters.description: Defines the number of Adults.

parameters.name: children
parameters.description: Defines the number of Children.

parameters.name: childAge
parameters.description: Age of a child in years.

parameters.name: bucket1Count
parameters.description: Number of children classified under the first Age Qualifying Group(Child Bucket#1).

parameters.name: bucket2Count
parameters.description: Number of children classified under the second Age Qualifying Group(Child Bucket#2).

parameters.name: bucket3Count
parameters.description: Number of children classified under the third Age Qualifying Group(Child Bucket#3).

parameters.name: bucket4Count
parameters.description: Number of children classified under the fourth Age Qualifying Group(Child Bucket#4).

parameters.name: bucket5Count
parameters.description: Number of children classified under the fifth Age Qualifying Group(Child Bucket#5).

parameters.name: promotionCode
parameters.description: Promotion code associated with the rate plan.

parameters.name: reservationGuestId
parameters.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

parameters.name: reservationGuestIdType
parameters.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID element.

parameters.name: attachedProfileId
parameters.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

parameters.name: hotelReservationId
parameters.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

parameters.name: hotelReservationIdType
parameters.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID element.

parameters.name: ratePlanInfo
parameters.description: If true Rate Plan Code Master information will be included in the response.

parameters.name: returnOnlyAvailableRateCodes
parameters.description: If true Only availability check will be done and it will return available rate codes.

parameters.name: resGuaranteeInfo
parameters.description: If true Guarantee Code information will be fetched with Rate Code Information. This attribute is only effective when RatePlanInfo is true.

parameters.name: roomTypeInfo
parameters.description: If true Room Type Master information will be included in the response.

parameters.name: membershipIdNumber
parameters.description: Membership id Number of the guest.

parameters.name: membershipLevel
parameters.description: Membership id Number of the guest.

parameters.name: membershipType
parameters.description: Membership id Number of the guest.

parameters.name: pointsAvailable
parameters.description: Used to indicate Points Available for Profile Primary Membership Type.

parameters.name: membershipCardNumber
parameters.description: Member Card number associated with the guest membership.

parameters.name: smokingPreference
parameters.description: Smoking preference to search a reservation. This is compared to the preference on the guest profile of the reservation.

parameters.name: hotelPackage
parameters.description: Hotel Package Code to filter the search result.

parameters.name: accessibleRoomTypesOnly
parameters.description: Used to fetch accessible room types only in the Rate Plan set.

200.description: Response object to search hotel availability based on request segment.

get.summary: Search hotels for the sales process
get.description:
This API is to search hotels for the sales process.

OperationId:getHotels

parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Hotel Type to filter the search result.

parameters.description: Hotel Amenity Code to filter the search result.

parameters.description: Attaction Code to filter the search result.

parameters.description: Hotel Package Code to filter the search result.

parameters.name: promotionCode
parameters.description: Promotion code associated with the rate plan.

parameters.name: reservationGuestId
parameters.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

parameters.name: reservationGuestIdType
parameters.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID element.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

parameters.name: currencyExchangeRates
parameters.description: If true Currency Exchange Rates information will be included in the response.

parameters.name: ratePlanInfo
parameters.description: If true Rate Plan Code Master information will be included in the response.

parameters.name: resGuaranteeInfo
parameters.description: If true Guarantee Code information will be fetched with Rate Code Information. This attribute is only effective when RatePlanInfo is true.

parameters.name: returnAllRates
parameters.description: Indicates whether to return only 'Requested' rate codes or 'All' rate codes. The default value is true which means all available ratecodes will be returned.

parameters.name: roomTypeInfo
parameters.description: If true Room Type Master information will be included in the response.

This API allows a time span of 90 days.

parameters.description: Arrival Date of the guest.

parameters.name: ratePlanCode

parameters.name: calculateEstimateAmount

parameters.name: numberOfAdults

parameters.name: numberOfChildren

parameters.name: roomType
parameters.description: Room Type for the reservation

get.description:
Use this API to get the Restrictions for a hotel in given date range. The search criteria can include filter codes or restriction control types, date range and the hotel information.

OperationId:getRestrictionsByDateRange

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID that identifies a single hotel property.

parameters.name: chainName
parameters.description: The name of the hotel chain (e.g., Hilton, Marriott, Hyatt).

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The ending value of the date range.

parameters.name: fetchSizeByDay
parameters.description: Defines the maximum amount of restrictions by day.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return.

parameters.name: restrictionSearchCriteriaStartDate
parameters.description: The starting value of the date range.

parameters.name: bookingChannelCode
parameters.description: Indicates restriction is applicable to specified Booking Channel Code in conjunction with other codes, if specified.

parameters.name: ratePlanCategory
parameters.description: Indicates restriction is applicable to specified Rate Plan Category in conjunction with other codes, if specified.

parameters.name: ratePlanCode
parameters.description: Indicates restriction is applicable to specified Rate Plan Code in conjunction with other codes, if specified.

parameters.name: roomClass
parameters.description: Indicates restriction is applicable to specified Room Category in conjunction with other codes, if specified.

parameters.name: roomType
parameters.description: Indicates restriction is applicable to specified Room Type in conjunction with other codes, if specified.

parameters.name: filterCodeCategory
parameters.description: An enumerated type defining the Filter Code Categort or Type. Values: BookingChannelCode, RoomClass, RoomType, RatePlanCategory, RatePlanCode.

parameters.name: filterCode
parameters.description: Defines BookingChannelCode, RoomClass, RoomType, RatePlanCategory or RatePlanCode to filter the Restriction.

200.description: Response object for fetching restrictions based on date range.

x-hotelid.name: x-hotelid
x-hotelid.description: Mandatory parameter to identify the hotel code where the end user is logged in

x-hubid.name: x-hubid
x-hubid.description: x-hubid is a logical grouping of multiple properties that allows api consumers to manage data from a group of properties. This x-hubid is a valid list of hub codes configured in OPERA to which the user has access. Rest APIs without hotelId in the operation path can support hub level integration using x-hubid

hotelAvailability.description: Response object to search hotel availability based on request segment.

rateChange.description: Indicates the amount returned is FIRSTNIGHT/HIGHEST/LOWEST/MOSTCOMMON/AVERAGE when there is rate change in the stay dates.

hotelInfo.description: Hotel information like hotel name,address,communication etc and also alternate hotel information if requested property is not available.

channelInformation.description: Channel related information if availability request is send for a channel.

ratePlanSet.description: Rate Plan Set whose Rate Plans are returned in the response.

hotelId.description: Hotel Code whose Rate Plans are returned in the response.

closed.description: If the availability response has a house level restriction, this flag will be true.

redemption.description: Used to indicate if the Room Rates returned are calculated based on points.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

pagingKey.description: Used to indicate the paging key(rate room) when more rate rooms available.

registrationNumber.description: Registration Number of the reservation for the current day.

currentRoomInfo.description: Room information of the reservation for the current day.

roomRates.description: A collection of Room Rates associated with a particular Room Stay. Each Room Rate combination can have multiple rates. Example King room, Rack rate plan, Monday through Thursday, weekday amount, Friday and Saturday, weekend amount.

expectedTimes.description: The Expected Arrival and Departure Times.

originalTimeSpan.description: The Original Time Span(Arrival, Departure) which covers the Room Stay. In case of Rolling No Show TimeSpan's StratDate moves forward but OriginalTimeSpan's StratDate remains the same.

guarantee.description: The guarantee information associated to the Room Stay. A maximum of 5 occurances are available for use depending on the context.

promotion.description: Promotions applied to the reservation to get the promotional rate.

total.description: The total amount charged for the Room Stay.

totalPoints.description: The total number of Points charged for the Room Stay.

multiValueAttrs.description: Informative indicators indicating different values of an attribute exists over the stay.

upsellInfo.description: Indicates Upsell Information to be applied on Reservation.

mobileNotifications.description: Denotes the status of Room Ready and Key Ready messages.

roomNumberLocked.description: When true, indicates a room number cannot be changed. When false, indicates a room number may be changed.

printRate.description: This control whether rate info will be printed in confirmation letter.

ownerReservationType.description: Indicates whether reservation is for Unit/Room Owner or Authorized User. If this attribute is not define it is a regular/rental reservation.

primaryShareType.description: This is populated in case of primary share scenario. This indicates whether this reservation is primary or non primary. Changes or postings to the 'non-primary' share reservation is not allowed.

remoteCheckInAllowed.description: Indicates whether the reservation is pre-registered for internet check-in or not.

uniqueID_Type.description: An identifier used to uniquely reference an object in a system (e.g. an airline reservation reference, customer profile reference, booking confirmation number, or a reference to a previous availability quote).

currentRoomInfoType.description: Room information of the reservation for the current day.

stayProfiles.description: Profile associated with the room Stay.

awards.description: Membership Awards code applied on the reservation.

startOnNightY.description: Starting night for consumption and posting prices.

postEveryXNights.description: Occurance of nights when the package needs to be posted and consumed.

certainNightsOfTheWeek.description: Post the package on certain nights of the week.

customStaySchedule.description: This user defined schedule lets you enter a posting rhythm over a 14-day period, starting with the arrival date, by assigning the day (number) within a guest stay for posting this package price.

customNightSchedule.description: The start and end of the posting period is determined as follows: If the package is attached to a rate code: The period starts with the date when the rate code to which the package is attached becomes effective for the stay. The period ends with the date of the last night for that rate code (or the last night of the stay if the rate code remains in effect until the departure date). If the package is attached separately to the reservation: The Begin Date specified on the reservation when the package was attached is the start date for the period. The End Date specified on the reservation when the package was attached is the end date for the period. If no Begin Date and/or End Date are specified when the package is attached to the reservation, the Begin Date is assumed to be the arrival date and the End Date is assumed to be the departure date of the reservation, irrespective of when the package is attached to the reservation.

tags.name: Availability
tags.description:
The Availability module provides APIs to fetch a properties room/rate availability, manage restrictions and hurdles. Restrictions can be set for the entire property or for a rate category, rate code, room class or room type.

Restrictions can also be set for a combination of these attributes, for example room class and rate code. You can also fetch available guarantee policies for a property in this module.
